pkgmetadata.longdescription: ![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3670A0?style=for-the-badge&logo=python&logoColor=ffdd54)![Github release](https://img.shields.io/github/release/atp-things/pkg-python-util.svg?label=tag&colorB=11ccbb)![](https://anaconda.org/andrazpolak/atpthings/badges/version.svg)[![PyPI](https://badge.fury.io/py/atpthings.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/py/atpthings)# ATP-thingsHomepage: https://atp-things.github.io/Repository: https://github.com/atp-things/pkg-python-util## PYPIURL: https://pypi.org/project/atpthings/### Install```bashpip install atpthings```## CondaURL: https://anaconda.org/andrazpolak/atpthings### Install```bashconda install -c andrazpolak atpthings```## Import```pythonimport atpthings```
